attributes.comment:
My husband and I are in the process of adopting a second child from China. As I
am sure you are aware, this process is very costly. Between the money that we
pay in the U.S. and the money we pay in China, it is very expensive. While it is
most definitely worth the money for the children we adopt into our families, any
additional costs make it hard to manage financially. We would like to be able to
take this money and use it for the necessities involved in taking care of these
precious children. Please understand that we want to provide only the best for our
new addition to our family and this additional cost takes away from that and
creates more of a burden financially.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Carla Alexander
